subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: When the Knicks were open for a shot, they were eager to make the extra pass, fulfilling Coach Mike Woodson’s goal for the team to move the ball in its preseason debut against the Wizards.
snippet: When the Knicks were open for a shot, they were eager to make the extra pass, fulfilling Coach Mike Woodson’s goal for the team to move the ball in its preseason debut against the Wizards.
